channel.title: Following Problem
channel.description:
how do you make it so that if a player is following another player, and the player being followed teleports, or is 15+ spaces away, it stops following them?
example:
Player A starts following Player B Player B teleports to end of wilderness from edgeville Player A is still following, so is running and noclipping through objects to get to the end of wilderness Player A arrives there after a few minutes
anyone no how to fix? >.>

item.title: Following Problem
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

delta, but hey… i need a method to check if there within 15 spaces of eachother, like so it noes if it shuld keep following or not

whenever i try, it always says there above 15, when i set it to check if there not within 15 spaces…

anyone no the proper method?

Read full topic
